description: A guided tour of the historic Münster Castle followed by a walk through its beautiful botanical garden.

locationInfo.description: An insightful tour through the impressive Münster Castle and a scenic walk through its lush botanical garden.
safetyTips: Wear warm clothing as the gardens can be chilly.
Stay with the group during the castle tour.
Check for guided tour availability before visiting.

activity: Indoor Climbing at Big Wall Kletterhalle
description: Challenge your group to a fun and active indoor climbing session at Münster’s largest climbing gym.

locationInfo.description: A spacious indoor climbing hall with walls of varying difficulty, perfect for beginners and experienced climbers alike.
safetyTips: Ensure proper harness fitting before climbing.

activity: Museum Visit at LWL Museum für Kunst und Kultur
description: Explore fascinating art and cultural exhibits at Münster’s renowned LWL Museum.

locationInfo.pathNameOrLocationName: LWL Museum für Kunst und Kultur
locationInfo.description: A modern museum showcasing art, history, and cultural exhibits from various time periods.
safetyTips: Respect museum rules and do not touch exhibits.
Keep voices low to avoid disturbing others.
Take breaks in designated seating areas.

description: Experience the charm of Münster’s winter market with food, crafts, and warm drinks.

locationInfo.description: A seasonal market featuring delicious treats, festive decorations, and local handcrafted goods.
safetyTips: Dress warmly, as temperatures can be low.
Keep an eye on personal belongings in crowded areas.
Try local specialties like hot chocolate or roasted almonds.

activity: Billiards & Darts Night at Billard Café
description: Enjoy a casual evening with friends playing billiards and darts at a popular local café.

locationInfo.description: A relaxed environment where groups can enjoy games of billiards and darts while socializing.
safetyTips: Be mindful of cues and darts when playing.
Follow the house rules of the café.
Keep an eye on drinks to avoid spills near the tables.
